lines.text: Roy, just talk nicely and she'll come out.
We've had "nice talking," now we're gonna have "door breaking."
[coaxing his wife while she's on the phone]
Shtall em, shtall em. Just keep shtalling em. Whatever you do shtall em!

[on the phone to the wedding reception]
Yes Mrs. Eisler we'll be down in two minutes.
Are you crazy?! I told you to shtall em!
I did stall them - you've got two minutes.
[Peering through the keyhole on the bathroom door]
Oh my god!
What is it?!
I ripped my stockings.
Is she in there?
She's in there, she's in there. Where am I going to get another pair of stockings?
Well if she doesn't show up who's gonna look at you?
Promise me you won't get hysterical.
Why? What'd you do?
Just promise me.
Alright, I promise. what'd you do?
I broke my diamond ring.
Your good diamond ring?
How many do I have?
